crab_claw.name: a sharp crab claw
crab_claw.description: The sharp, serrated claw from a giant crab.

crab_shell_fragment.name: a crab shell fragment
crab_shell_fragment.description: A hard, mottled fragment from a giant crab's shell.

iridescent_mucus.name: a vial of iridescent mucus
iridescent_mucus.description: A vial filled with a thick, shimmering slime. It seems valuable.

paralytic_slime.name: a glob of paralytic slime
paralytic_slime.description: A sticky, grey glob of slime. It numbs the fingers on contact.

rusted_dagger.name: a rusted dagger
rusted_dagger.description: A pitted, rusted dagger. It's barely functional as a weapon.

crude_trinket.name: a crude trinket
crude_trinket.description: A worthless piece of junk, perhaps a button or a shiny shell tied with string.
